about_the_game:
Dead Flamingo is an action-adventure fantasy game that follows the epic story of a young fisherman driven by hopeful ideals in an insidious world that meets its end every seven days.

The story is mainly set in the ocean, sailing in water, exploring islands, and discovering environmental puzzles. In Dead Flamingo, your main objective is to find a way to break the cycle that sees the world, and everything in it, come to an abrupt and violent end every Sunday night. To do this you must uncover the secrets of this world, build relationships with the characters scattered above and below the ocean, and fight disturbing, Lovecraftian monsters.

Boundless Sailing: Embrace the Open Seas

Battle on the High Seas: Confront Ferocious Foes

Journey Through the Ocean's Charms and Trials

Stuck in a Time Loop: The World Reset Every 7 Days

name: Dead Flamingo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
